Package org.neo4j.internal.kernel.api.helpers

Class CachingExpandInto

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.internal.kernel.api.DefaultCloseListenable
      • org.neo4j.internal.kernel.api.helpers.CachingExpandInto
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, AutoCloseablePlus
    public class CachingExpandInto
extends DefaultCloseListenable
    Utility for performing Expand(Into) Expand(Into) is the operation of given two nodes, find all interconnecting relationships of a given type and direction. This is often a computationally heavy operation so that given direction and types an instance of this class can be reused and previously found connections will be cached and can significantly speed up traversals.

        public RelationshipTraversalCursor connectingRelationships​(NodeCursor nodeCursor,
                                                           RelationshipTraversalCursor traversalCursor,
                                                           long firstNode,
                                                           int[] types,
                                                           long secondNode)
        Creates a cursor for all connecting relationships given a first and a second node.
        Parameters:
        nodeCursor - Node cursor used in traversal
        traversalCursor - Traversal cursor used in traversal
        firstNode - The first node
        secondNode - The second node
        Returns:
        The interconnecting relationships in the given direction with any of the given types.
